competitors.name: Tenable/Nessus
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with on-premises deployment vs Qualys cloud approach

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Major security vendor with vulnerability assessment

competitors.name: Tripwire
competitors.notes: Security configuration and vulnerability management provider

context: By 2010, the vulnerability management market had matured significantly. Qualys established itself as leader in cloud-based cybersecurity. Key differentiators included deployment models (cloud vs on-premises), with Qualys pioneering purely cloud-based approach.
